    • Method Detail

      • checkIfLoginValid

        void checkIfLoginValid​(CustomVolleyListenerLogin CVL,
                       java.lang.String emailId,
                       java.lang.String password)
        This function makes a call to the database to learn if the user's password and username corresponds to a real user. The thread created by this function calls a class in CVL when it has an answer from the server, either an ID or a fialure message.
        Parameters:
        CVL -
        emailId - username provided by user
        password - password provided by user

      • getUserDataById

        void getUserDataById​(CustomVolleyListenerLogin CVL,
                     java.lang.String userId)
        Once the user's ID has been retrieved, this one takes the ID and retrieves the user's info from the database
        Parameters:
        CVL -
        userId -

      • checkIfUserCredentialsExist

        boolean checkIfUserCredentialsExist​(java.lang.String p,
                                    java.lang.String u)
        Before calling the database, check the strings given by the user for proper length. This will avoid unneccecary accidental calls to the database by users that haven't finished logging in.
        Parameters:
        p - password provided by user
        u - username provided by user
        Returns:
        if the user has put in a valid username and password
